ViewObject.Name: BookTypeLOV
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select 74 as code ,'CREDIT NOTE BOOK (DEBTOR)' as Value from dual union select 75 as code ,'CREDIT NOTE BOOK (CREDITOR)' as Value from dual union select 76 as code ,'DEBIT NOTE BOOK (DEBTOR)' as Value from dual union select 77 as code ,'DEBIT NOTE BOOK (CREDITOR)' as Value from dual union select 78 as code ,'PURCHASE BOOK' as Value from dual union select 79 as code ,'SALES BOOK' as Value from dual union select 80 as code ,'BANK BOOK' as Value from dual union select 81 as code ,'CASH BOOK' as Value from dual union select 82 as code ,'CASH SALE BOOK' as Value from dual union select 83 as code ,'JOURNAL BOOK' as Value from dual union select 86 as code ,'EXPENSE BOOK' as Value from dual
